posts.post_content:
Eats Goyfs  
Eats Flashback/Snapcaster  
Eats Reanimator  
Eats Ichorid/Dredge  
Eats Self mill ([Ruinator](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ruinator))  
Eats undying/persist creatures  
Eats Zombies ([lord of the undead](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=lord of the undead), [cemetery reaper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=cemetery reaper))  
Eats Threshold  
Grows to monstrous proportions in regular games (especially multiplayer.)  
Does all of this at instant speed.  
  
Is legal in every format but pauper.

posts.post_content:
Has some nice synergy with [Deadbridge Chant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Deadbridge Chant). Gives the ooze stuff to snack on, and lets you exile the stuff you don't want Deadbridge Chant to bring back.  
  
Also, pulled this card and [Jace, Memory Adept](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jace, Memory Adept) in the same sealed pull. Even if Jace was destroyed before milling them to death, ooze finished the job. Makes me want to create a BUG mill deck.
posts.html:
Has some nice synergy with Deadbridge Chant. Gives the ooze stuff to snack on, and lets you exile the stuff you don't want Deadbridge Chant to bring back.

Also, pulled this card and Jace, Memory Adept in the same sealed pull. Even if Jace was destroyed before milling them to death, ooze finished the job. Makes me want to create a BUG mill deck.

posts.post_content: Pick up your playsets before they get ridiculously expensive again... Modern just got overhauled by this little guy. It made big waves in Legacy, and it'll get stupid in Modern. Answers Goyf, reanimator, Gifts, EMRAKUL, Deathrite Shaman's ammo, and can get bigger than Goyf potentially. Good thing Spell Snare, Bolt, and Path can get it, or this would just be ridiculously overpowered in the format.
posts.html:
Pick up your playsets before they get ridiculously expensive again... Modern just got overhauled by this little guy. It made big waves in Legacy, and it'll get stupid in Modern. Answers Goyf, reanimator, Gifts, EMRAKUL, Deathrite Shaman's ammo, and can get bigger than Goyf potentially. Good thing Spell Snare, Bolt, and Path can get it, or this would just be ridiculously overpowered in the format.
